--- select_with_sequence_function.sql
SELECT GET_NEXT_SEQUENCE_VALUE(SEQUENCE my_sequence) as next_id

--- AST
&ast.QueryStatement{
  Query: &ast.Select{
    Results: []ast.SelectItem{
      &ast.Alias{
        Expr: &ast.CallExpr{
          Rparen: 51,
          Func:   &ast.Ident{
            NamePos: 7,
            NameEnd: 30,
            Name:    "GET_NEXT_SEQUENCE_VALUE",
          },
          Args: []ast.Arg{
            &ast.SequenceArg{
              Sequence: 31,
              Expr:     &ast.Ident{
                NamePos: 40,
                NameEnd: 51,
                Name:    "my_sequence",
              },
            },
          },
        },
        As: &ast.AsAlias{
          As:    53,
          Alias: &ast.Ident{
            NamePos: 56,
            NameEnd: 63,
            Name:    "next_id",
          },
        },
      },
    },
  },
}

--- SQL
SELECT GET_NEXT_SEQUENCE_VALUE(SEQUENCE my_sequence) AS next_id
